      • encode

        public static java.lang.String encode(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Character,java.lang.String> codeTable,
                                      java.lang.String userinput)
        Encodes the text input from either a file or a string.
        Parameters:
        codeTable - HashMap of encoded 0's and 1's.
        userinput - Text of what the user inputs to be encoded.
        Returns:
        Returns a string in the form of 0's and 1's. The encoded output.
